t: What is your review on the Nexfan portable AC? Does it really work or is it a scam? - Quora
s: Answer: It is not a compressor based AC. It is a very small evaporative cooler. It will work provided you have it in a small room (say a toilet), and it is not a humid day. So while it is not exactly a scam, it is highly misleading about what it can do.
